title: Its been a season and i still have level 0 honour
body:
Hello, ive been chat restricted 2 times and from then on ive had no warnings. This was like 6+ months ago. And i still have it. Even after the season reset. So i have a question, how do i earn back my honour?

Because ive been honoured by my teamates alot. Its really frustrating because i wanted end season rewards and i improved my attitude from then on. Please help.

replies.body: you're probs like me and still calling people retards or flaming. just pull the enter key out of your keyboard or lock it so you can use it typing at all decreases the chance of you getting it back

> [{quoted}](name=00shots00,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=g2nuIGww,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-01-16T23:22:40.379+0000)
>
> you're probs like me and still calling people retards or flaming. just pull the enter key out of your keyboard or lock it so you can use it typing at all decreases the chance of you getting it back

Learn how to edit bro, duplicate posts aren't cool.

well I don't understand what your problem is then. play more games and be honourable and you will get your honour back. my smurf went from being chat restricted twice to now lvl 3 honour in 60 ranked games.
I did man, i got 3 honours just my last game and no honour progress at all.
well id say about 28 games of mute all and not talking at all only pinging got me from 0 to 1
But i need to communicate with my team to win? But if thats what its going to take then fine. {{summoner:4}} {{champion:23}}

You can communicate fairly effectively with pings, but if you don't want to mute straight away, then just remember if you're going to to type something, is it kind, is it true, is it necessary? It's stricter than you really have to be, but if you're prone to negativity then it's a good way to keep yourself out of trouble.

If someone is tilting you, just mute them. No amount of lost communication is going to be worth how much worse tilt makes you play, nevermind if it tempts you into negativity. 

If all else fails, unbind your enter key with something like auto hot key or gaming keyboard software if you have it. That way you can still read what they say but aren't tempted to  type back.

if you're dishonored or level 1 or any level and locked you will not receive end of season honor rewards. that said your games might not be as clean as you think even calling out peoples kda as a bm can stop you from getting your honor back.

> [{quoted}](name=Örnn Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=g2nuIGww,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-16T20:04:19.497+0000)
>
>you will not receive end of season honor rewards.

No such thing.
i am correct if your honor is locked or its 0 you wont get end of season rewards, end of season rewards are for level 2+ but that's if you honor is not locked

So unlocking honor and moving back up isn't so much about being honored (yes they do help a lil but aren't the end all be all of moving up), it's about maintaining a positive/neutral attitude throughout your games. If you are still being reported (even if no punishment is coming through) and the reports are deemed to be valid, it is going to halt your honor progression.
So your basically saying the enemy can false report me and i will never get honour back? thats bad.
No, i said that if the reports are **valid** you won't be getting honor back. If they are reporting you for nothing then you will still go up.
And also if this i true that means the honour system is broken and needs repairment
